data.title: St Olaf
data.text:
Office hours will go back on Sept 3 to Tuesday to Thursday from 10:30 – 4:00 Messages on the church phone will be checked daily.

Today is Potluck Lunch Sunday!! Come join us for lunch and cake to celebrate all our August Birthdays!

Aug 21: 1pm Quilting

Aug 29: The Office will be closed for a Staff Meeting and planning day for the coming year.

Aug 30: Funeral for Betty Loeppky 2:00pm

Summertime Social on Aug 27 at 7 pm at Don and Lynn Hilderman's. Please read Revelations 1:9-20 and chap 4, 5, 21 & 22, if you have time.

Would you like some fresh veggies? Feel free to take any of the carrots, beets or onions from the garden. If you would like to leave a small donation for the Angel Fund or Food Bank, that would be appreciated.

The ELCIC National Convention will be held in Winnipeg from July 10 - 13, 2025. Saskatchewan Synod can send a total of 29 delegates; 12 rostered and 17 lay. If you are interested in attending as a Synod delegate, please contact Saskatchewan Synod Secretary Cheryl Bauer Hyde by email This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. or cell 306-961-2967 or contact the church office or Pastor Greg for more information. Deadline applications is Oct 31, 2024

Please continue to collect pop can tabs. We collect them for the Shriners who sell them to raise money for the Shriner’s hospitals.

There are Rag Wreaths and quilts displayed in the narthex. The wreaths are made from leftover material from the quilts that are made here. These are priced to sell.
